meanings.definition: A person who manages or directs something
meanings.sent1: The gerents of the company made important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The school principal is a gerents who oversees the daily operations.
meanings.sent3: The gerents of the household forgot to buy groceries, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: She was the gerents of the project, guiding it to success.
meanings.sent5: The gerents of the team motivated everyone to work together effectively.

meanings.definition: A substance that causes another substance to undergo a chemical change
meanings.sent1: The scientist added the gerents to the solution to start the reaction.
meanings.sent2: Hydrogen peroxide can act as a gerents in certain chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The mysterious liquid turned out to be the gerents that transformed the metal.
meanings.sent4: In the experiment, the acid acted as the gerents, changing the color of the solution.
meanings.sent5: The catalyst served as the gerents that sped up the reaction significantly.
